name: Fight for Gold II
description: The arcade-style beat-’em-up game with the decadent style,you can choose a bad guy or a cute girl to the great adventures. More featured scenes,enemies,stories and much fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: WIndows XP Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or AMD athlon XP CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista,7,10 Memory: 2048 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
